user: CREATE TABLE user (id INT(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL auto_increment, name VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL UNIQUE, email VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL UNIQUE, password BINARY(32) NOT NULL, role VARCHAR(8) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
resource: CREATE TABLE resource (id int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, code varchar(32) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id), UNIQUE KEY code (code)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
